changeSet.id: wres.MeasurementUnit - Create measurementunit table for any dbms
changeSet.author: James Brown

column.name: unit_name
column.remarks: Name or abbreviation for a unit of measurement

changeSet.comment: The wres.MeasurementUnit table has been created, along with all default entries.

changeSet.author: James Brown
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO wres.MeasurementUnit(unit_name) SELECT 'CMS' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit WHERE unit_name = 'CMS' );
INSERT INTO wres.MeasurementUnit(unit_name) SELECT 'CFS' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit WHERE unit_name = 'CFS' );
